CustomField.description: Enables 'after insert' trigger on Note that enqueues job to convert into ContentNotes in near real-time. This async conversion does not slow down save transaction, and if 'Delete Notes' option is enabled then deletes in separate transaction too.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables 'after insert' trigger on Note that enqueues job to convert into ContentNotes in near real-time. This async conversion does not slow down save transaction, and if 'Delete Notes' option is enabled then deletes in separate transaction too.
CustomField.label: Convert in Near Real Time?
